verbose_text: To disrupt mTORC1 signalling in RPCs (XREF_FIG A) we crossed mice carrying floxed Rptor alleles (Rptor tm1.1Dmsa, referred to as Rptor f/f) with animals harbouring an Lhx2-promoter driven Cre-recombinase transgene (Tg (Lhx2-Cre) 1Lcar, referred to as Lhx2-Cre), which promotes LoxP recombination in RPCs prior to the onset of neurogenesis and mTORC1 signalling.
evidence: Lhx2-promoter driven Cre-recombinase transgene (Tg(Lhx2-Cre)1Lcar, referred to as Lhx2-Cre)              , which promotes LoxP
